name: MONEYZONE
description:
MONEYZONE is a fast paced action-arcade game in which you must amass as much wealth as possible. Things are not easy going in the MONEYZONE, be cautious of the incoming attacks from your rival, and the presence of the ever-vicious tax zones. In the MONEYZONE, greed is good.

Controls:

Arrow keys to move.

Space-bar to select.

What's new in Version 1.2:

  • Balance changes - tax zones now cause you to lose reputation.
  • Changed UI for displaying reputation and money when in game, these now appear at your reticle in order to help you focus on the action.
  • Minor visual polish added.
